main event: On March 6, 1962, witnesses observed a green light in the sky for approximately 3 to 4 minutes. The light appeared stationary at first, then moved rapidly northwest before disappearing.
interesting points: The observation took place at approximately 7:30 p.m.,The observation was made by three witnesses, all of whom were students and aged around 15,The light was described as having no sound and being stationary before it moved,The sighting occurred in Westfield, Massachusetts,The object was reported to be very bright and visible for several minutes.
sighted object: a green light in the sky
